item.title: Chemistry Cheat Sheet
item.description: TOC How To Read The Squiggles Is A Chemical Bond Polar? How To Read The Squiggles In order to make shorthand easier, chemists omit C and H atoms from its structural formula. There are two simple rules for adding them back in: All sharp corners represent carbon atoms. Hydrogen - carbon bonds are implied (so if a carbon atom has less than 4 bonds, the rest are H).
